articles.title: Kia EV6 Is What Car? Car Of The Year - InsideEVs
articles.description: The Kia EV6 has been named as What Car? Car Of The Year thanks to its practicality, great range and reasonable pricing.
articles.content: The KiaEV6 has been named as What Car?'s Car Of The Year for 2022. The electric crossover saw off stiff competition from the likes of the Tesla Model Y and Ford Mustang Mach-E to claim the top prize,… [+1410 chars]
